item.title: Future Market Networks Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Future Market Networks Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Diversified Commercial Services sector, plunged to their lower circuit limit on 20 Feb 2026, reflecting intense selling pressure and panic among investors. The stock closed at ₹8.30, down 1.89% on the day, marking its maximum permissible daily loss and signalling heightened market anxiety. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Reliance Industries Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Sentiment
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd has emerged as the most active stock in put options trading ahead of the 24 February 2026 expiry, signalling a notable shift towards bearish positioning and hedging among investors. Despite a modest day gain, the underlying stock’s technical indicators and option market activity suggest growing caution in the oil sector giant’s near-term outlook. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: IDBI Bank Ltd. Sees Exceptional Volume Surge Amid Positive Price Momentum
item.description: IDBI Bank Ltd. emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 20 Feb 2026, registering a remarkable surge in volume and price performance. The private sector bank witnessed a total traded volume exceeding 71 lakh shares, accompanied by a 2.9% gain in its share price, signalling renewed investor interest and potential accumulation after a brief correction phase. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Sanwaria Consumer Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Sanwaria Consumer Ltd, a micro-cap player in the FMCG sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 20 Feb 2026 as its stock hit the lower circuit price limit, closing at ₹0.27 with a maximum daily loss of 3.57%. The stock’s persistent downtrend and mounting selling pressure have raised concerns among investors, reflecting a deteriorating market sentiment and weak fundamentals. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Suzlon Energy Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Suzlon Energy Ltd, a key player in the Heavy Electrical Equipment sector, witnessed one of the highest trading volumes on 20 Feb 2026, with nearly 1 crore shares exchanging hands. Despite this surge in activity, the stock continued its downward trajectory, hitting a fresh 52-week low and signalling persistent selling pressure amid rising investor participation. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Tata Consultancy Services Sees Surge in Call Option Activity Ahead of Expiry
item.description: Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. (TCS), a stalwart in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, has witnessed a notable spike in call option trading activity ahead of the 24 February 2026 expiry. This surge reflects growing bullish sentiment among investors, despite the stock trading close to its 52-week low and underperforming its moving averages. Detailed analysis of option volumes, strike prices, and market positioning reveals nuanced investor expectations for the large-cap software giant. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Sadbhav Engineering Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Sadbhav Engineering Ltd (Stock ID: 577653) surged to its upper circuit limit on 20 Feb 2026, closing at ₹9.28, marking a robust 4.98% gain on the day. This micro-cap construction stock demonstrated significant buying pressure, outperforming its sector and broader market indices, despite a recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: HDFC Bank Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Sentiment
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd., one of India’s leading private sector banks, has witnessed a notable increase in put option trading activity ahead of the 24 February 2026 expiry, signalling growing bearish positioning and hedging among investors. The surge in contracts at strike prices close to the current market value reflects cautious sentiment despite the bank’s large-cap stature and recent sector-aligned performance. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: ICICI Bank Ltd. Sees Robust Value Trading and Institutional Interest Amid Narrow Price Range
item.description: ICICI Bank Ltd. (ICICIBANK) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 20 Feb 2026, reflecting strong institutional participation and a notable upgrade in its MarketsMOJO rating. The private sector banking heavyweight recorded a total traded volume of 13.25 lakh shares with a turnover exceeding ₹184 crore, signalling sustained investor confidence despite a modest price movement. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: ICICI Bank Sees Surge in Call Option Activity Ahead of February Expiry
item.description: ICICI Bank Ltd., one of India’s leading private sector banks, has witnessed a notable increase in call option trading activity as the 24 February 2026 expiry approaches. The surge in open interest and turnover at the 1400 strike price signals growing bullish sentiment among investors, despite the stock’s recent modest price movements and a Hold rating from MarketsMOJO. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, witnessed intense selling pressure on 20 Feb 2026, culminating in the stock hitting its lower circuit price limit. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: R&B Denims Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Surge, Hits New 52-Week High Amid Strong Accumulation

item.title: Mphasis Ltd Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Market Sentiment
